clinical_study.brief_title: Impact of Rutin and Vitamin C Combination on Oxidative Stress, Insulin Sensitivity and Lipid Profile in Type 2 Diabetic Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of the Impact of Rutin and Vitamin C Combination on Oxidative Stress, Insulin Sensitivity and Lipid Profile in Type 2 Diabetic Patients

brief_summary.textblock: The objective of this study is to investigate the effect ofRutin and Vitamin C combination in comparison with vitamin C alone on the oxidative and antioxidative status , insulin resistance and lipid profile in type 2 diabetic patients.

primary_outcome.measure: Oxidative stress marker (MDA) and antioxidant capacity (SOD) in diabetic patients
primary_outcome.description: Effect of Rutin and vitamin C combination or vitamin C alone on oxidative stress marker (MDA) and on antioxidant capacity (SOD) in diabetic patients after 8 weeks of treatment.
Effect of Rutin and vitamin C combination or vitamin C alone on insulin resistance in diabetic patients before i and after treatment for 8 weeks .
Impact of Rutin and vitamin C combination or vitamin C alone on lipid profile in diabetic patients (TC,TG,HDL-c,LDL-c).

secondary_outcome.measure: Quality of life of diabetic patients and this will be evaluated by using Quality of Life Questionnaire (Short Form 36 questions (SF-36)) .
secondary_outcome.description: The effect of Rutin and vitamin C combination on quality of life of diabetic patients before and after treatment for 8 weeks and this will be evaluated by using Quality of Life Questionnaire (Short Form 36 questions (SF-36)) .

arm_group.description: patients will receive Rutin 60 mg in combination with vitamin C 160 mg three times daily in addition to usual antidiabetic treatment for 8 weeks..
patients will receive vitamin C 500 mg once daily in addition to usual antidiabetic treatment for 8 weeks.
patients will receive their usual antidiabetic treatment only for 8 weeks.

intervention.intervention_name: Rutin in combination with Vitamin C
intervention.description: Rutin and Vitamin C will be supplied as tablets containing 60 mg Rutin and 160 mg Vitamin C. The use of Rutin and Vitamin C will be under the trade name of RUTA C 60 ® manufactured by KAHIRA PHARM.& CHEM. IND. Company
Vitamin C will be supplied as capsules containing500 mg of Vitamin C. The use of Vitamin C will be under the trade name of C-Retard ® manufactured by HIKMA Quality Company.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- • Patients' age 35 years or older having type 2 diabetes mellitus.
- Patients taking oral diabetic medications (Sulfonylurea) not taking Insulin.
- Able to understand and willing to sign a written informed consent document
Exclusion Criteria:
- • Pregnant and breast feeding females
• use of vitamin supplements containing vitamin C or other antioxidants.
- patients with renal or hepatic failure.
- patients taking insulin as antidiabetic treatment
